thread.title: New program aims to make buildings more energy-efficient
thread.title_full: New program aims to make buildings more energy-efficient

author: Brian Johnson
title: New program aims to make buildings more energy-efficient
text:
Home / Brief / New program aims to make buildings more energy-efficient New program aims to make buildings more energy-efficient By: Brian Johnson August 4, 2015 4:48 pm 0 A newly launched program is challenging owners and managers of existing commercial buildings in Minnesota to reduce energy consumption. A goal of the statewide Minnesota Energy Star Challenge is to reduce energy consumption in buildings by 20 percent and to increase participation in the U.S. Environmental Protection Agencyâ€™s Energy Star program.
